x_nuvo_diag_probes.description: Probe that checks for Warehouse Manager scoped Schemas in Clinical WO Manager Applications, when Warehouse Man application is not installed.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Check for WM scoped schems
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: Install the Warehouse Manager application or delete/deactivate any schemas that use the WM scope.

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_811670421b7ee51088b2777e0a4bcb46
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Probe that checks for Warehouse Manager scoped Schemas in Clinical WO Manager Applications, when Warehouse Man application is not installed.</description><healthcheck_type/><name>Check for WM scoped schems</name><order/><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation>Install the Warehouse Manager application or delete/deactivate any schemas that use the WM scope.</remediation><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();

var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_scope');
var gr2 = new GlideRecord('x_nuvo_mobile_schema');

gr.addQuery('name','Warehouse Management');
gr.addActiveQuery();
gr.query();

if(!gr.next())
{
	gr2.addQuery('sys_scope','18d89e881b323700eede21be6e4bcb2d');
	gr2.query();
	if(gr2.next())
		util.handleOutput('one or more schemas are in the "Warehouse Manager" scope, but the Warehouse Manager application is not installed. Delete or deactivate schemas for tables with x_nuvo_wm prefix to fix this.','warning','Mobile');
}]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>pierson.arnold@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-05-15 14:03:59</sys_created_on><sys_id>811670421b7ee51088b2777e0a4bcb46</sys_id><sys_mod_count>24</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Check for WM scoped schems</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_811670421b7ee51088b2777e0a4bcb46</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:26</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
